issue.title: [C++][Doc] PlasmaClient is threadSafe now, doc not update
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10954](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10954). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a pr https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4503 make PlasmaClient thread safe now, but in the doc there's "Note that a PlasmaClient object is not thread safe.", which causes misunderstanding.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10954?focusedCommentId=17251472) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8958
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8958>
